ygData.subject: RE: Bag of Troll Guts
ygData.msgSnippet: This is from Allakhazam s site.  If it s true then the quest is either broken or I completed it incorrectly as this is what I thought I d done: Fabian s
ygData.messageBody:
This is from Allakhazam's site. If it's true then the quest is either
broken or I completed it incorrectly as this is what I thought I'd done:

Fabian's Strings: Sansa Nusk in the Bard's Guildhouse is trying to make lute
strings for Fabian. This is a difficult task because
Fabian uses special strings made out of Troll Gut, and Sansa is all out.
Sansa will ask you to bring her troll gut so she can make
string for Fabian. I have been told that Troll Gut can be found on a ghoul
named Zahal the Vile in North Karanas. It might also be
found on some trolls wandering in the Karanas, but I am not sure of that.
(Submitted by Doriath)

> > troll guts. I've been kicking myself ever since. Try right
> clicking on it
> > to see if it will open like a backpack. I'm dying to know.
>
> Doesn't open, just one somewhat heavy item. Next time I'm in Qeynos I'll
> see what she has to say, thanks for the info.
>
> Athren
